attributes.action: Strip Philip Green of his knighthood.
attributes.background:
Knighthood awarded for services to the retail industry - he stripped all assets of BHS , and sold it for £1.00 , thus  jeopardising pensions and jobs . 
He paid £400, 000,000 in dividends to his wife in Monaco -( a tax haven). He left a £57,000,000+ deficit in the pension fund .

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
